video.title: Halt and Catch Fire
video.synopsis: Re-creating the dawn of the personal computer era, this digital drama tracks the fates of an industry visionary and his brilliant colleagues.

episodes.synopsis: In 1983 Dallas, a enigmatic visionary, an engineer and a computer prodigy join forces to create a faster, cheaper PC that will challenge IBM.
episodes.title: I/O

episodes.synopsis: After surviving a legal threat from IBM, Joe's team at Cardiff must overcome internal differences and begin building their new faster, cheaper PC.
episodes.title: FUD

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Cameron struggle to make Joe's vision a reality, while Joe and Bosworth attempt to procure capital to fund the making of the new machine.
episodes.title: High Plains Hardware

episodes.synopsis: As Cameron nears completion of the BIOS, a crisis threatens the project's future and requires all hands on deck to save the machine.
episodes.title: Close to the Metal

episodes.synopsis: Cameron battles with her new manager, while Joe and Gordon attempt to acquire a key piece of new technology for the computer.
episodes.title: Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Cameron's new idea puts her at odds with Gordon, leaving Joe with a difficult decision. Later, personal barriers collapse during Hurricane Alicia.
episodes.title: Landfall

episodes.synopsis: A visitor from Joe's past threatens his newfound connection with Cameron. With Donna out of town, the toll of Gordon's work catches up with him.
episodes.title: Giant

episodes.synopsis: As the team prepares for COMDEX, scandal rocks Cardiff Electric, Gordon pulls the presentation together, and Bosworth makes a personal sacrifice.
episodes.title: The 214s

episodes.synopsis: At COMDEX, unforeseen rivals and obstacles threaten all that the team has worked for, forcing them to change the product to stay in the game.
episodes.title: Up Helly Aa

episodes.synopsis: As Gordon and Joe prepare to ship the Giant, a suspicious defect destroys their partnership, and Cameron takes her future into her own hands.
